title: FALSE: Noynoy Aquino quote on Filipinos owing democracy to his father
subtitle: Aquino did not say this. There are no official transcripts or news reports that prove he said this quote.
author: rappler.com
vclaim:
This claim was emailed to the Rappler fact check team for verification.

Aquino did not say this. There are no official transcripts or news reports that prove he said this quote attributed to him.

Rappler found no transcripts, news reports, or video recordings that prove he said this.

Further, Aquino's spokesperson Abigail Valte told Rappler, "I'm certain he never said that. He would never speak in a manner implying that Filipinos owe his father anything."

Keep us aware of suspicious Facebook pages, groups, accounts, websites, articles, or photos in your network by contacting us at factcheck@rappler.com. Let us battle disinformation one Fact Check at a time.
